title: Seven WONDERS of OUR WORLD
body_text:
A lot can happen in a year .. now try SEVEN!
In this ultra-rare preview of ANNIVERSARY SEVEN,
East Coast Dodgeball
's man behind the madness goes all out - from
ECD
's most fierce feuds and memorable match-ups to the game's biggest shockers and even the dodgeball-formed "marriages"!
Now before you shout "How is that better than .. ?", please keep in mind that each listing is placed in random order. There is no ranking amongst the seven finalists if you will; trust that it's difficult to narrow nominations down to seven. And if such remains debatable, please by all means speak up!
Historical battles that shaped and reshaped ECD -
ONE ▬ ryan letsche v. grant cornero
Two intense, fearless, athletically-blessed competitors whose ascension virtually parallel; this duo truly went above and beyond the call of duty to elevate each other's rise atop the ranks.
→
CXX
→
125
→
151
TWO ▬ valerie winston v. lauren winston
A record-setting six grueling match-ups and a 2-2-2 score yet to be settled; the Winston Sister confrontations are undoubtedly among some of the most memorable in
ECD
's storied history.
→
DAY 1
→
54 | One Year Anniversary
→
SIXTY-IX
→
102 | Two Year Anniversary
→
175 | 5 Year Anniversary
→
184 | STAR WARS
THREE ▬ chris adams v. kevin fitzpatrick
The revolutionary rivalry that altered behind-the-scenes booking; an enduring year-long struggle [and then some], "The Axe" and "Fitz" made immediate history with a dreaded
CREAMation
bout and a violent pair of three-on-three matches.
→
70
→
105
→
CXV
→
184 | STAR WARS
FOUR ▬ ray marzarella v. sascha basista
One
Rimshot Contest
proved to be the life-changing odyssey for the blocking magician and break-dancin' dodger, and all within the '07 calendar!
→
84
→
NINETY 4
→
103
→
CXV
FIVE ▬ john tronolone v. kevin adams
The cream of the crop, the passing of the torch; Tronolone-Adams is the classic story of the old and young lion battling it out for the coveted seat at the throne.
→
49
→
LXXXI
→
100
→
174 | IMMACULATE REDEMPTION
SIX ▬ justin wolf v. juan londono
Polar opposite personalities, mirrored paths to superstardom; it didn't take long for "Wolf v. Juan" to generate into one of
ECD
grandest collisions of all-time.
→
CXL | FAMILY AFFAIR I
→
142
→
158
SEVEN ▬ diana dibuccio v. justin pierce
The tale of trash-talking, comedic dodgeball giants; a mighty void would have been felt  without the first "Rivalry of the Year" Award winners.
→
91
Honorable Mention
→ Kevin Megill v. Michael Edwards → Sascha Basista v. Joey Smalls → Rob Avakian v. Juan Londono → Kevin Megill v. Chris Adams → Tom Adams v. Juan Londono → John Tronolone v. Kevin Megill → Valerie Winston v. Lauren Freda
Adrenaline-pumping fights to the finish, in most cases -
ONE ▬ DODGEBALL 150 | 08.09.2008
→
Bobby Vetrano, Travis Mills, Juan Londono fought Alison Bertsch, Lauren Stopa, Diana DiBuccio to a 3 - 3 Draw
An astounding 51-person melee, "The Battle of the Sexes" three-vs-three encounter, and the tie score that went unsettled.
TWO ▬ DIVORCE COURT (176) | 10.16.2010
→
Ryan Rafferty, Ashley Hoppe, Dan Spengeman defeated Julia Dennebaum, Michael Edwards, Michelle Mullins, 4 - 3
A trio of couples divided in the sport's 10th
CREAMation
extravaganza and man-o-man, what a nail-biting finish.
THREE ▬ DODGEBALL 96 | 07.14.2007
→
Rob Avakian defeated Juan Londono, 4 - 3
An all-around, fun-filled event capped with an incredible, one-on-one conclusion. This was the first of three contests between Avakian and Londono.
FOUR ▬ STAR WARS (184) | 08.13.2011
→
Justin Pierce, Valerie Winston, Kevin Fitzpatrick fought Chris Adams, Lauren Winston, Michael Edwards to a 5 - 5 Draw
The subtitle said it all:
ECDElite
Hall of Fame alliances post-induction each vying for the monumental victory.
FIVE ▬ DODGEBALL 100 | 08.18.2007
→
Justin Pierce, Michael Edwards, Kevin Adams defeated Kevin Fitzpatrick, Ryan Letsche, John Tronolone, 6 - 4
The first-ever 3-on-3 in a five-hour brawl for all the marbles at the biggest and best of all-time.
SIX ▬ DODGEBALL 41 | 05.27.2006
→
Joe Kelly defeated Derek Carty, 6 - 5
A then record-setting attendance and the magical, multi-event reign of Kelly made this one unforgettable.
SEVEN ▬ DODGEBALL CXV | 12.08.2007
→
Juan Londono, Ray Marzarella, Kevin Fitzpatrick defeated Rob Avakian, Sascha Basista, Chris Adams, 5 - 4
Nicknamed "The War To Settle The Scores", 2007's most bitter rivals collided one last time in this do-or-die confrontation.
Honorable Mention
→ DODGEBALL VII (V. Winston v. Freda) → DODGEBALL 15 (T. Adams v. Gassner) → DODGEBALL 105 (C. Adams v. Fitzpatrick II) → DODGEBALL 95 (Megill v. Edwards II)
The ECD-formed alliances made plenty of headlines throughout their tenures -
ONE ▬ michelle mullins & dan spengeman
Perhaps the most helpful behind-the-scenes, this lovable duo also carries a wealth of experience to combat any adversaries.
TWO ▬ sara decuir & michael edwards
The perfect combination of speed and agility; an ultra-athletic pair to say the very least.
THREE ▬ melissa kerr & michael "sputz" krott
Four collective season finale main events? Not too shabby for this once-known security team.
FOUR ▬ joanice lima & christopher adams
The newly-wedded 2011-2012 sensation and
ECDElitist
raised plenty of havoc before their departure in August '12.
FIVE ▬ lauren stopa & justin pierce
The
only
ECDElite
Hall of Fame couple and still together six glorious years later - say no more.
SIX ▬ kathryn nogueira & tom adams
Her homebaked goods and his "god-like" athletic presence have been embedded into the
ECD
record books for eternity.
SEVEN ▬ alison bertsch & michael butler
The brains and the braun of
ECD
's elite couples; throw in three impressive season finales too.
The moments no one could have predicted -
ONE ▬ DODGEBALL 155 |
"Police Officers Unexpectedly Entered The Worshipped Battlegrounds ..."
| 09.13.2008
Despite
ECD
's family-friendly nature (especially on this night), one unhappy cop had apparently seen enough.
TWO ▬ DODGEBALL LX3 |
"An Invasion That Sparked A Revival ..."
| 11.11.2006
The anti-
ECD
messages were heard loud and clear, but it was the revelation of the invaders that shocked the community.
THREE ▬ DODGEBALL 171 |
"Tronolone Laid The Rumors To Rest, Publicly Announcing His Retirement ..."
| 01.03.2009
A much-needed extended vacation to recharge his battery.
FOUR ▬ DODGEBALL 23
(TWENTY-TWO Aftermath)
|
"The Dodgeball Courts Were Completely Iced-Over ..."
| 01.16.2006
Mother Nature was hell-bent on ceasing the weekly dodgeball tradition during this crazy winter season.
FIVE ▬ DODGEBALL VII |
"A Huge Blue Light Filled The Sky ..."
| 10.08.2005
The inaugural, unforgettable "Wet War" and the mystery that surrounded it!
SIX ▬ DODGEBALL 41 |
"Gonna Need Surgery So It Stays Put ..."
| 05.27.2006
Chris Burke's ugly injury set the tone for the weeks, months, and years to come; who would have thought!?
SEVEN ▬ WARRIORS (186) |
"The Long-awaited Return Of The Legendary Catching Machine ..."
| 10.08.2011
"Sputz's" half-year hiatus was terminated for his one-night-only re-emergence.
A stroke of genuis and a passion for more; these are the game's most influential -
ONE ▬ steve adams
The comedic "Picture Framed" Award recipient was one of the original social gatherers. The "Last Man Standing" three-minute timer and the secondary attraction
Battle Royal
are a credit to his longterm influence as well.
TWO ▬ michael "sputz" krott
Along with several unusual weapons (BeeBall anyone?), the creator of
GodMode Rules
and one of
ECD
's first big-time catchers carved his name indefinitely.
THREE ▬ john tronolone
From promotional posters, the colorful website, and in-depth statistics, to the on-court additions like the
Dodgeball Draft
,
Pick Your Poison
stipulation, and pre-game
Rimshot Contest
,
ECD
's proud founder and primary organizer always kept his creative juices flowing.
FOUR ▬ ryan mccrorey
A debt of gratitude is owed to this recognized figure for his early-day accessories like the radio (soundtracks included!) and giant-sized scoreboard in an effort to evolve the sport both on and off the court.
FIVE ▬ christopher adams
The 2009 chancellor, you name it and it's his: the ever-dangerous
BoxBall Dodgeball
, the fun-filled
SuperMario Dodgeball
, and even several event anthems!
SIX ▬ diana dibuccio
While Tronolone may have had the final decision, it was never a rarity to find this female legend offering advice and lending a helping hand any way possible.
SEVEN ▬ ryan letsche
WALL v. ALL
and the forever used and abused wooden regeneration targets are major contributions thanks to this
ECDElite
Hall of Famer.
The grandest, most magnificent stages of them all -
ONE ▬
DODGEBALL CXL (FAMILY AFFAIR I) | 05.31.2008
The everlasting annual tradition began here complete with mailed invitations and the beginning stages of "Wolf vs. Juan".
TWO ▬
DODGEBALL 20 | 12.30.2005
ECD
's first Super Bowl-sized spectacular amidst the sight and sound of the 37 in attendance; a cold winter classic for certain.
THREE ▬ DODGEBALL 150 | 08.09.2008
Draped beach towels, colorful beachballs, and an estimated 90 total attendees around courtside helped keep this big-time event fresh in mind.
FOUR ▬
5 YEAR ANNIVERSARY (175) | 09.11.2010
Creepin' up in age introduced the
ECDElite
Hall of Fame; an incredible 41 participants made it a top-ten attended.
FIVE ▬ DODGEBALL 100 | 08.18.2007
The unparalleled hype and record turnout that
still stands today
. What.. a.. night!
SIX ▬
FAMILY AFFAIR III (173) | 07.24.2010
The rebirth of the
Tronolone Years
brought the band back together forever.
SEVEN ▬
DODGEBALL 50 | 08.04.2006
The number says it all, as does the insane, 47-person waterballoon fight!
Undoubtedly the toughest list to formulate, pay your respects to these iconic bunches -
ONE ▬ the fitzpatricks
The legendary Kevin, the hard-hitting Dan, the up-and-coming Eamon, and the Mr. and Mrs. who always kept a watchful eye; truly one of
ECD
's finest.
→ Additonal members: brother Brendan Fitzpatrick.
TWO ▬ the winstons
Venus and Serena have nothing on Valerie and Lauren; six-time anniversary event headliners and three different
CREAMation
battles shaped these Hall of Fame careers.
→ Additonal members: brother Jack Mess.
THREE ▬ the letsches / vetranos
Cousins Ryan Letsche and Bobby Vetrano produced plenty of memorable happenings, with each warriors' parents in full support courtside.
→ Additonal members: brother/cousin Brody Letsche, aunt/mother Sue Vetrano, and cousin/sister Alyssa Vetrano.
FOUR ▬ the butlers
James "Jim" Butler was one of the original twelve veterans from DAY 1 and competed at various times during his career; younger sibling Michael went on to become one of the top stars of the 2007-2008 calendar.
→ Additonal members: cousin Dan Carroll.
FIVE ▬ the adams
Safe to say the most recognized family in history; while the ever-loving matriarch Gaile was baking brownies for all the soldiers, her boys - Chris, Steve, Tom, Kevin - were easily knocking 'em down. Don't forget about Aunt Cicily!
→ Additonal members: cousin Dan Karen.
SIX ▬ the cartys
Then 15-year old Kyle's career commenced at the very first dodgeball extravaganza and remained instrumental for a lengthy time; older brother Derek gained more fame with his high intensity and overall atheltic ability en route to his multiple excellence awards.
SEVEN ▬ the corneros
Grant powered his way to the top of
ECD
's competition while the elder sibling Bob and proud father Robert made history becoming the first father-son duo to lead a team into battle.
→ Additonal members: sister Abigail, uncle Bob Miskiewicz and cousin Sophia Miskiewicz
Honroable Mention
→ The Kellys → The Tronolones → The Spengemans → The Pellecchias → The Guarinos → The Nogueiras → The Pierces/Browns
________________________________________
________________________
Did that grand ol' Writer hit the nail on the head? Again, if not, don't be afraid to express yourself as your views most surely count! And if anything, hopefully that wondrous nostalgic feeling returned even for a brief few minutes.
All that remains on "The Road To SEVEN" is the final preview of the magnificent spectacle itself. The detailed match announcement, the story behind our potential 500th participant, and so much more will be covered later this week. You do not want to miss this!

________________________________________________________________


Did that grand ol' Writer hit the nail on the head? Again, if not, don't be afraid to express yourself as your views most surely count! And if anything, hopefully that wondrous nostalgic feeling returned even for a brief few minutes.

All that remains on "The Road To SEVEN" is the final preview of the magnificent spectacle itself. The detailed match announcement, the story behind our potential 500th participant, and so much more will be covered later this week. You do not want to miss this!
